CrediBULL Crypto: With developing PA, now confident enough to say I think the lower region from my original chart is out of play.
The SEC backing off $ETH is likely the nail in the coffin for bears here. 
I think our green region here holds and $ETH looks good for new ATH.
articles.title: Bruh?

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Zeus that you?

Bill Drummond: i was the first developer to experiment with rebasing beyond the original use case of algorithmic stablecoins. i made a project that was designed to only go up. and people went crazy. and so did i. overnight, this coin i made as a joke blew the fuck up and i had a huge following
articles.title: Zeus that you?

RT CrediBULL Crypto
Nah fam lol. It’s not over it’s just starting.
The biggest gains in any bull market happen in the last 10% of the cycle.
It ain’t over till the $BTC chart starts lookin like the $NVDA chart.

KyCards85: @CredibleCrypto Any part of you think it’s over?
